metadata.title: Simply Southern Adventure More Worry Less Short Sleeve T-Shirt
features: AMAZING FIT: This shirt has a great look and cool fit. No matter what times of the year it is, we have a shirt for it all! Graphic t-shirts are the perfect way to make a statement. Simply Southern is dedicated to staying on trend to bring you the most up to date designs. T-shirts also make a great gift for friends and family

HIGH QUALITY: Simply Southern always has an ever-growing selection of apparel to suit the needs of the whole family. All of these t-shirts are printed in the USA. There are shirts for all occasions – birthdays, Christmas, holidays, mothers day, and seasonal shirts. This makes these shirts the perfect gift for all the special people in your life – wife, husband, mom, dad, daughter, grandma, grandpa, aunts, uncles, boyfriend, girlfriend, co-workers, and friends.

DESIGN: Midnight blue short sleeve shirt with a pink van and a white cooler with pink striped chairs under an awning; the phrase "Adventure more... Worry less"; and the Simply Southern logo on the back. Small Simply Southern SS palm tree logo on the front chest. Pre-shrunk and ring-spun 100% cotton with ribbed crew neckline. Unisex sizing.
